Random Thoughts, ed. 3 - Can't Spell Waterfall

At least not without these other spellings

    Into the Future

  • You're just going to have to wait, you know. In the meantime, checkout: Riot, Riot Rails, Jubilator, Inquisition, or just google for some random images (not helping with that).

Jan 10, 2010

Hey! Here’s another in the series of random thoughts …

You can’t spell Waterfall without these words :)

  • ew
  • fatal
  • real flaw
  • fear wall
  • fear Walt - It’s a damned mickey-mouse methodology
  • we fall
  • all wet
  • late war
  • faal - Languages are tools, not boundaries
  • fae law
  • a tall few
  • wart ale
  • flea trawl
  • fat aw
  • Lar tale
  • a lew fart
  • wall art
  • a flare
  • rale
  • later
  • lawfare - you can make it mean something
  • after wall - it’s just an anagram

Other points of note are that some of the words that can be made from “waterfall” relate to authority in some language or another, for instance: Lar, frea, and walt.
